description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for unit testing purposes, which implements the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface using Google Mock. It specifies mock methods for various service-related functions, enabling controlled testing of components that depend on this interface.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A Google Mock class for the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface, providing mock implementations for unit tests.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates if the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported, given a uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with provided strings.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with a uint32_t and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with two strings.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if the service is in the background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks service as unavailable with reason.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Sets or gets configuration line with a string.
